dialog.title: Create question set with AI
dialog.intro: Choose the prompt that matches your later export goal (flashcards or quizzes) and copy it into your AI environment.
dialog.prompt_guide:
- **[Anki](https://apps.ankiweb.net/)** prompt: first choice for this MC-Test App and perfect for creating Anki flashcards with complex formula formatting and no text-length limitations.
- **[Kahoot](https://kahoot.com)** prompt: tuned to Kahoot's import restrictions (text length, MC options, time limits).
- **[arsnova.click](https://arsnova.click)** prompt: optimized for the university-favorite audience-response tool (LaTeX formulas, Markdown).
dialog.upload_warning: ⚠️ Your question set may contain at most 30 questions and must be no larger than 5 MB.

- The bars show the share of achieved points per topic (in %).
- The parentheses behind the topic show: (answered questions / total questions).
- When very few questions for a topic were answered, the percent values are statistically less meaningful.

warnings.no_config:
⚠️ **No configuration file found!**

The app needs either a `.env` file or `.streamlit/secrets.toml` for configuration (admin access, QR-code URL, etc.).

**For local installation:**
1. Copy `.env.example` to `.env`:
   ```bash
   cp .env.example .env
   ```
2. Restart the app.

**Details:** See [INSTALLATION_ANLEITUNG.md](INSTALLATION_ANLEITUNG.md)
